meanings.definition: A person who spends more money than they can afford.
meanings.sent1: My friend is an overspender and always struggles to pay bills on time.
meanings.sent2: The overspender couldn't resist buying the latest gadgets, even though they had no use for them.
meanings.sent3: The overspender thought they were a millionaire until the bills arrived.
meanings.sent4: Being an overspender is like having a leaky wallet that never stops draining.
meanings.sent5: The overspender's bank account was a bottomless pit due to their spending habits.

meanings.definition: To spend more money than is necessary or prudent.
meanings.sent1: I tend to overspend during the holidays and regret it later.
meanings.sent2: She always overspends on clothes, even though her closet is already full.
meanings.sent3: The overspender's credit card cried out in agony with each swipe.
meanings.sent4: Overspending is like trying to fill a bucket with a hole at the bottom.
meanings.sent5: He overspendered his way into debt by constantly buying things he didn't need.
